item.description:
Ho, Ho, Holy-cow it's holiday time again! Come join BostonPHP for some merriment and good cheer (aka hoist a pint). For all of the telecommuters, it'll be kind of like the office party without the office. - for the rest of us, more like a pub crawl. So pack your "thinking cap", a tough OSS/PHP problem, and an appetite for participation, we're throwing a paah-tee.

Please bring a friend, bring some cheer, bring your wallet (we're meeting at the Cambridge Brewing Company) and please bring us some figgy pudding (yuck!).
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup December Meetup
